title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 208.23 - Matchmaker not to act as manager
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 208.23 - Matchmaker not to act as manager

State Regulations

No principal, director, officer, agent or owner of a licensed
matchmaker shall, directly or indirectly, serve as or act as the manager, assignee or second of any boxer or mixed martial artist, or be employed by or
be in any way connected with the manager, assignee or second of any boxer or
mixed martial artist unless otherwise directed or authorized by the

Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
208.23

Adopted

New

York State Register September 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 38, eff. 9/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
